result.arabic_text: لِّيَسۡـَٔلَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ عَن صِدۡقِهِمۡۚ وَأَعَدَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا
result.translation: Imana Allah Yafashe isezerano kuri abo Bavugishwamana kugira Izobabaze ku kungene bumviwe n’abo barungitsweko, Iheze Ihembe abemeramana Ubwami bw’ijuru, Yaranategekanirije abagarariji ibihano bibabaza ku musi w’izuka.
